select to_char(9876.23 , 'fm9999999999999999999990D0000') from dual;
-- 0表示用0补齐，建议使用以下格式fm99999999999999999999999999999990D999999
select to_char(-0.2342134312, 'fm99999999999999999999999999999990D999999') from dual;
select to_char(12342.2342134312, 'fm99999999999999999999999999999990D999999') from dual;
